message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by previous customers. I believe its worth is more than $150 to you. Let's start with an offer of $200 for the product. Looking forward to your response.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your offer. In order to find a fair compromise, I propose we set the price at $160 for the product. This reflects the value we place on it while remaining accessible to you. I hope this proposal works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To accommodate you, I propose we set the price at $155 for the product. This is slightly above your last offer but remains within a reasonable range. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $145 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. Considering your feedback and our ongoing negotiation, I propose setting the price at $150 for the product. This brings us to a fair compromise, reflecting both your budget and the value we place on the item. I hope this final offer suits your needs.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $150 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product. Can we meet in the middle one last time?

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $145 for the product. This is the best offer I can make given the value I place on it and the current market conditions. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $145 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $135 for the product. This is my final offer, please let me know if it's acceptable.
